channel.title: Recent debian kernel update breaks lkrg
channel.description: After updated to kernel 4.19.0-14, system failed to boot. Error log [p_lkrg] Loading LKRG... [p_lkrg] LKRG initialized successfully! [p_lkrg] ALERT !!! MODULE KOBJ HASH IS DIFFERENT !!! - it is [0x310ba26421c49403] and should be [0x435bd78fc5a2c015] !!! [p_lkrg] ALERT !!! SYSTEM HAS BEEN COMPROMISED - DETECTED DIFFERENT 1 CHECKSUMS !!! Kernel panic - not syncing: [p_lkrg] Kernel Integrity verification failed! Killing the kernel...

item.title: Recent debian kernel update breaks lkrg
item.dc:creator: 9087203sdaf
item.description:
After updated to kernel 4.19.0-14, system failed to boot.
Error log
[p_lkrg] Loading LKRG…
[p_lkrg] LKRG initialized successfully!
[p_lkrg] ALERT !!! MODULE KOBJ HASH IS DIFFERENT !!! - it is [0x310ba26421c49403] and should be [0x435bd78fc5a2c015] !!!
[p_lkrg] ALERT !!! SYSTEM HAS BEEN COMPROMISED - DETECTED DIFFERENT 1 CHECKSUMS !!!
Kernel panic - not syncing: [p_lkrg] Kernel Integrity verification failed! Killing the kernel…

Read full topic
item.source: Recent debian kernel update breaks lkrg
